SummaryEnglish: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home.

54.TitleEnglish: The Penguin That Wishes To Fly

83.TitleEnglish: The Lonely Lord Of The Castle

3.SummaryEnglish: This program is an animation series about a Japanese dog, Charo. He meets and is helped by many mythical creatures of Northern Japan as he searches for eight star talismans.
